title: Portfolio Website (Personal)
description: Crafted a dynamic portfolio website highlighting projects and experiences with React, JavaScript, Node.js, HTML, and CSS.

title: MUN Concrete Toboggan
description: Led a team in designing a 3D printed model for toboggan headlights using OnShape. Implemented LED headlights with Arduino, controlling them via a C++ program.

title: MUN Concrete Toboggan Website
description: Crafting the MUN Concrete Toboggan website with Astro, TypeScript, and CSS. Seamlessly integrating design and functionality for a dynamic online presence.

title: Tetridunio
description: Developed a Python-based Tetris game integrated with Arduino, showcasing it exclusively in an invite-only event. Presented insights into the project's development process and code logic alongside the final gameplay.

title: Platformer Game (Personal)
description: Created a JavaScript mini-game to enhance programming prowess. Engaged in coding challenges to hone skills while enjoying interactive learning.

title: AeroEvac
description: Developed AeroEvac model, a pulley system for emergency evacuation, via OnShape. Collaborated on comprehensive project report encompassing cost, safety, and product analysis.
